item.title: Timing Execution to Help Optimize for Loops
item.description: I was working on optimizing some code that contained a series of loops. I began my analysis by running a few different versions of the program and timing each execution. The results were enlightening! I decided to share the approach with my team along with an essay on the topic by Guido Van Rossem. General Rules of Thumb by Which to Develop Loops Never optimize before you have proven a speed bottleneck exists.
